text_block_list.text: There is a lot to be grateful for. The people who have helped us, those who have stood by our side as rivals.
For me, I… would also like to convey my gratitude towards my favoured items… like my treasured hat, who are always by me.
Of course the greatest gratitude will come back your way, when you help your horsegirl reach her goals… Hehe, good luck!
Now that your outlook looks blessed… perhaps some sort of miracle will come!
